vault_rabbitmq_secret_backend_role.description: Creates a role on an RabbitMQ Secret Backend for Vault.

backend.description: The path the RabbitMQ secret backend is mounted at,

name.description: The name to identify this role within the backend.

tags.description: Specifies a comma-separated RabbitMQ management tags.

vhosts.description: Specifies a map of virtual hosts to permissions.
